description: Detached single storey annexe to rear for use ancillary  to the main dwelling
decision_conditions: <p><span data-contrast="none" xml:lang="EN-GB" lang="EN-GB" class="TextRun SCXW98043717 BCX8" style="-webkit-user-drag: none; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; user-select: text; text-align: justify; line-height: 18px;">By reason of the fact that the site is located within an area of land liable to flooding, and insufficient information has been provided within the submitted Flood Risk Assessment to in relation to; compensatory flood storage, drainage strategy details and permeable paving, the applicant has failed to demonstrate that the proposed development would not exacerbate the risk of flooding within the site or increase the risk and consequences of flooding elsewhere. The proposal would thereby be contrary to the National Planning Policy Framework (2021), Policy SI 12 C and SI 13 of the London Plan (2021), </span><span data-contrast="auto" xml:lang="EN-GB" lang="EN-GB" class="TextRun SCXW98043717 BCX8" style="-webkit-user-drag: none; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; user-select: text; text-align: justify; line-height: 18px;">Policy CS1.U and CS1.W of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012), </span><span data-contrast="none" xml:lang="EN-GB" lang="EN-GB" class="TextRun SCXW98043717 BCX8" style="-webkit-user-drag: none; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; user-select: text; text-align: justify; line-height: 18px;">Policy DM9 A (a), (b) and (c) and DM10 A, C and D of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).</span><br></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:14.2pt"><span lang="EN-US" style="">The existing
outbuilding, by reason of its inclusion of primary living facilities and by
reason of its scale, general design, cramped backland siting and
uncharacteristic positioning, would form an incongruous, unsympathetic and
contrived development with the appearance of the separate standalone dwelling,
which would appear unduly at odds with the established pattern of residential
dwelling development in the area and would have the appearance of Garden Land
Development, of the type which is generally resisted within the borough. It
would be of a design and appearance which is out of character, at odds with the
appearance of the wider area and adversely impacts upon the overall visual
amenity of the wider area. The proposal would therefore give rise to an inappropriate
form of development on Garden Land and be contrary to the high quality design
aspirations of the National Planning Policy Framework (2021), Policies D3.D(1)
and D3.D(11) of The London Plan (2021), Core Policies CS1.A and CS1.B of the
Harrow Core Strategy (2012), Policy DM1 A., DM1 B. (a), (c) and (d), of the
Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013), the adopted
Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010) and the
adopted Supplementary Planning Document: Garden Land Development (20</span>1<span lang="EN-US" style="">3)</span>.<span lang="EN-US" style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif;mso-ansi-language:EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
